svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Death rate from cancers vs. extreme poverty, 2014
The death rate refers to all forms of cancers and is standardized for age to allow cross-country comparisons.
Poverty headcount ratio at $1.90 a day (2011 PPP) (% of population)
